A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Having grown up on the originals back in the 80s\, I can see why this film would challenge lifelong fans such as myself\, however I find it to be an excellent transitional film\, bridging the gap\, aggressively between the old and the new.  It's a theme repeated multiple times in the dialogue of the film and it's intentionally meant to be jarring to the traditionalist.  However\, I believe the film is creating a platform with which to end the old storyline and launch us into a much broader galaxy worth exploring outside the orbit of the Skywalkers.
